Package com.gsm.repository

Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,​java.lang.Long>
    @Repository
public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,​java.lang.Long>

      • search

        @Query("SELECT u FROM User u WHERE :keyword IS NULL OR LOWER(u.userName) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :keyword, \'%\')) OR LOWER(u.department) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :keyword, \'%\')) OR LOWER(u.productionLine) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT(\'%\', :keyword, \'%\')) OR u.phoneNumber LIKE CONCAT(\'%\', :keyword, \'%\')")
java.util.List<User> search​(@Param("keyword")
                            java.lang.String keyword)
        Searches for users based on a keyword against multiple fields.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The term to search for.
        Returns:
        A list of matching Users.

      • findDistinctDepartments

        @Query("SELECT DISTINCT u.department FROM User u WHERE u.department IS NOT NULL AND u.department <> \'\'")
java.util.List<java.lang.String> findDistinctDepartments()
        Retrieves a unique, non-empty list of all departments from the User table. The `DISTINCT` keyword ensures that each department name appears only once in the result.
        Returns:
        A list of unique department names.

      • findDistinctProductionLines

        @Query("SELECT DISTINCT u.productionLine FROM User u WHERE u.productionLine IS NOT NULL AND u.productionLine <> \'\'")
java.util.List<java.lang.String> findDistinctProductionLines()
        Retrieves a unique, non-empty list of all production lines from the User table.
        Returns:
        A list of unique production line names.
